trends: There have been no other sightings in around Val Court Qecbec
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI would always look in the sky gazing at stars in the night or in the morning will this one I was looking at one star as I would see a airplane with its with blinking light pass through the sky. As I was watching this one star in particular for the longest time. While my wife driving into the village in the Val-Court area suddenly this star I was watching descend suddenly very fast in a downward direction in the sky.With evasive action for 4 seconds then it would stop then it would make a circular motion within that time. and after that it was all I would see I just took my eyes of it. and What affected me the most to see how fast past through the morning sky about that fast per-second. this has been the 3rd encounter that I had saw with in 2005 that I been here.
Summary: my wife was driving about that time of morning as she was taking her son and us to her folks to stay over and spend Christmas. and as I was watching this one star way up in the sky as it was on the right side of me while she was driving the car.
